Location:
- Balcony off a residential unit (second floor); small outdoor seating area with white metal bistro set; gray-painted deck; metal railing; sliding glass door.

Observations:
- Round table and two chairs, cushion on one chair; railing with vertical balusters appears intact; deck surface uniform with no visible cracking or staining; no obvious water intrusion or mold.

Potential Issues:
- No visible issues.

Recommendations:
- Routine maintenance: check railing fasteners for tightness; inspect deck coating for wear or rust in future; keep furniture secured during high winds; clean surface to prevent slipping and monitor for any corrosion.
